操你妈傻逼暴雪死小丑

1. The Overwatch 2 update made me lose several skins; Officer DVA and Valkyrie Mercy being just a few of them. I contacted Blizzard support and they took about a month to tell me, "hehe it is a known bug, sucks to suck!" These skins have been missing for 10 months now with 0 clue when or if they will ever be returned to my account.

2. Where is the option to change the language in game?

3. Locking heroes behind a paywall is disgusting. Greedy pig company.

4. I hope Blizzard goes bankrupt. I truly do. It is so incredibly sad how they manage to make games people like and then just trash it.

f**k blizzard and f**k Bobby Kotick

首先声明我不是故意来刷差评的 但是至于你为什么沦落到今天这个地步 我想大家心里都有自己的看法 我只记得那是一个16岁的夏天 16岁很普通的家庭里的孩子 兜里凑出100块高中生活费去毫不犹豫的和几个朋友一起买入游戏 因为游戏玩法新颖独特当时我和我的小伙伴们去网吧开黑的首选游戏 为了各种帅气的皮肤去付出时间 因为本不是氪金的富哥 当时觉得升级箱子开出金那真的是很喜悦了 还经常在各种节日出一些限定的皮肤去网吧熬夜通宵 和小伙伴相互帮忙刷皮肤 可后来当年一起开黑的小伙伴都不玩了 游戏也因为各种问题不温不火了 后来大学实现了游戏自由 还是偶尔会去上面看一看自己的皮肤 打几把 还通过活动免费获得了最牛逼的那个版本 当年都觉得是富哥才有的 可能后来还会和朋友关注到有的活动出了 上去打打皮肤 玩成了收集游戏 什么游戏不都是这样呢 人们都喜欢收集 对于像我这种 本也没什么财富的人 这无疑来说对我算是我个人的一部分财产和青春 后来突然有一天就得知你拥有的一切要不复存在了 心中难免会有一些不舍但也无奈 所以作为我这种普通到不能在普通的玩家来说 你让我怎么说你好 总的来说 游戏以前真的不错 但是你真的垃圾 以前都说什么暴雪游戏 我奶奶都爱玩的游戏 我现在 感觉真的这么做的公司 我还是头一次听说 别的不别的 玩家是无辜的 只能说烂人 烂公司

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore

暴雪.捏麻麻洗了捏
Personajes rotos y la tienda es un robo.

对待狗暴雪的三大策略
     1白嫖游戏
     2从不充钱
     3集体刷差评
     友军们加油 ，游戏是能玩的 ，钱是不可能冲的  ，差评是绝对要给的。
Bad game Lol

曾经的暴雪，姐夫主导守望的时代称之为神
现在的暴雪，尻迪克臭傻逼的时代称之为屎

哈哈，正找不到地方骂呢，傲慢的傻逼暴雪高层，操你妈，傻逼，我操你妈考迪克。对中国市场的傲慢嘴脸，就他妈的恶心，老子专门下载挂个时长来骂你，我靠，我都想不出来还有啥脏词了。尻迪克，你走夜路必被，跨性别同性恋性别流体坦克抑郁症精神病患肉山尼哥强暴致死，吔！终极羞辱！

不过说回来，毕竟游戏是回归了，竞技游戏是OW的本质，没有必要为了表现不满，就开挂去污染环境，因为这样做恶心和伤害的是其他玩家。

overwatch 1 > overwatch 2



One element of but a long story of how a revered game company came to be one of the worst in a matter of a few years. Amongst other games, Overwatch was one such element which negatively suffered at both the hands of blizzard ineptitude but also pressures from Activision. A game we can realistically expect to no longer exist within a few years, perhaps even months.

The game turned a much loved hero shooter with a fair price and decent reason to return throughout the year, into a a mess which continues to disappoint fans as it continues to delay or poorly produce expected features.
我受到了召唤，我必须差评！

玩归玩，骂肯定是要骂的，老子初中三年的心血，五六百级，一堆皮肤，说没就没了，还钱！！！！！

可惜是运营商垃圾，这游戏我一代的时候就在看，小时候没电脑，现在有了却只能玩到暴雪拉的屎，好评是点给我的情怀的，而不是狗屎运营商

Lot of people have comments on this game, so I'll give mine. I started playing Overwatch back in 2018 had a lot of fun with it. That core game is still here, and now it's free. You may not like that skins cost money, but they are an optional aspect to the experience. New characters are in the battle pass but they are free at rank 45 of the pass (which doesn't take long) and any heroes you miss are unlockable just by playing games.

Despite what others may say, if you're looking for a team-based hero shooter, then give this a shot. I really like it. Maybe you will too. If not, well it was free, so nothing lost. gl hf and don't get lost in the complaints :).
